746:3281: bhadramukha bhaiṣajyaṃ me vyapadiśeti sa kathayati ārya ghṛtasya pānaṃ piba |

746:3396: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |

746:3487: tena khalu samayenānyatamo bhikṣurābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ |
